title: Can't find Rawr! emote.
body:
Hey, 
I just used an emote-capsule or something like that, I got from a quest. 
I've got the Rawr! emote, but it's neither in my Loot nor in my Collection.

replies.body: The emotes seem to be taking some time before appearing in the Emote tab of the collection (have experienced it personally, known others who have and there's a few examples on the boards as well, I think), so it may simply be a matter of giving it some time. I'd recommend giving it about a day (24 hours, give or take) to see if it appears, and if not I'd recommend you submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (probably the "General League of Legends question" option would be most appropriate) and request assistance with the situation from them.
